headline: Steel Dynamics Announces First Quarter 2025 Cash Dividend Increase of 9% and an Additional $1.5 Billion Share Repurchase Authorization
summary: FORT WAYNE, Ind., Feb. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Steel Dynamics, Inc. today announced that the company's board of directors declared a first quarter cash dividend of $0.50 per common...
